original_title: Sri Lanka airport restaurant, branded clothing franchise to Flemingo
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has awarded a franchise to operate a restaurant and branded clothing and accessories stall at the Bandaranaike International Airport at Katunayake, to Flemingo Duty Free (Pvt) Ltd, a statement said.
The international restaurant chain or a branded clothing outlet will be in the departure and transit areas of the airport.
The cabinet of ministers had approved the award for 3 years at a price of 2,502,624 dollars.
Sri Lanka is expecting around 2.0 million tourist arrivals this year. (Colombo/Apri06/2023)
